textNeverListenFirstContent: Put musics never listened at the beginning.
textSortWeightContent: Choose the importance of the smart sort compared to the random sort. Increasing the dumb side will bring back into fashion music that is rarely listened to or liked.
textWhitelistContent: Only the content of whitelist folders is displayed.
textDeletePrefsContent: Preference settings such as loop mode, sort mode or number of song per loop will be reset default values.
textDeleteDataContent: Listening data will be delete to reset smart sort (save global statistics).
textDeleteGlobalStatsContent: Total number of listens and total listening time will be reset.
textImportContent: Import songs statistics from a backup. Current data will be permanently deleted (Reload recommended).
